PreferenceCategory.android:title: Heart zones (use at own risk, under doctor supervision)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Red background above maximum
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show red background above maximum heart rate, even if heart zones are off.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use broadcast data if possible
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: On some devices (e.g., some MiBands) you can get heart rate data without connecting, as the device broadcasts heart rate either all the time or in workout mode. On those devices, don't connect, just get the broadcast heart rate.
